ComicInfo.Title: Part 2: The $4,289,512 Man
ComicInfo.Summary:
Steve Austen thought he had an easy mission…drop by Japan, stop a bad dude from launching missile, job done. That was BEFORE his cybernetic leg got chopped off. Now he’s gotta fight for his life, fending off countless samurai mercenaries while his body powers down…
By CHRISTOPHER HASTINGS (The Unbelievable Gwenpool! Secret Agent Deadpool! Adventure Time! I Am Groot!) and DAVID HAHN (Batman ’66! Bombshells: United!)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Michael Walsh | 1 | B | Cover B | Adam Gorham | 2 | C | Cover C | Felipe Magana | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Adam Gorham | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Michael Walsh | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Felipe Magana | 6 |
